Text:
WHY OH WHY are some people still using ISO?  I put these 9 gigs on my hard drive then use another 9 gigs unpacking them to the VIDEO_TS folders so I can watch them in a normal DVD viewer (I don't care that VLC plays ISOs, I don't like it or use it for that). Now I have 18 gigs gone and I'm looking at 9 totally useless gigs of iso files and thinking, I have to waste 9 gigs of drive space to help seed this? So I delete the ISOs and move on. And RAR is even worse. On the other hand, if the torrent was the VIDEO_TS folders in the first place, well hey! I'd keep seeding for a long time, because I can seed and watch them at the same time for years to come. No wasted gigs of drive space.

There's not a fuckin' thing in the world to be gained by posting the ISO. People who know how to burn an ISO know how to burn a VIDEO_TS folder. This is why so many foolish ISO and RAR torrents die: No seeders.

Thanks for the up. I'll seed until I have it complete, at least.

WHY DIDN'T YOU TELL US THESE WERE SHRUNK DOWN FROM DUAL LAYER?

Deleted at 1%.  What a total fuckin' waste.
Hey it's FREE! Stop your bitching! I don't see anyone else sharing this!

Hey spike, I can sense your need to be teacher's little pet and wave the "go buy it"" flag and hope you get a nice pat on the back, but the fact is that this SHRUNK-DOWN TORRENT OF A SET OF ISO FILES TOTALLY FUCKING SUCKS.  All I've done is warned future downloaders IN CASE this isn't the kind of shit they want to waste their bandwidth on.  And it WILL eventually get shared in full DVD-9 quality, just like the entire Mike Judge Collection and everything else have already been.  So YOU go buy it, or download this SHIT version, your choice, while I patiently wait for a sensible share.

And no racial slurs, please, you ignorant fucking juvenile cunt.

I did buy this I bought 2 YES 2 copies. One to open and watch the other to put with my collection. So like uhh shut up or something! Who's being racist? It would be "THEIR" pennies not "THERE" pennies, but I don't guess they teach that level of spelling in the 4th grade.  So I forgive you.

Look, as much as I'd like to stick around and continue to bitch-slap you down the road toward manhood, long and challenging road that it will be for you, I have other adventures to pursue.  You're on your own, little boy.
